casebody.data:
MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2002-1956. Tucker v. Wilson.

Clermont App. No. CA2002-01-002, 2002-Ohio-5142. On amicus curiae motion for leave to file under S.Ct.Prac.R. XI of the Ohio Academy of Trial Lawyers and motion of amicus curiae Member Companies of the American International Group, Inc. for leave to file a memo in response to OATL’s motion for leave. Motions granted.

Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor and O’Donnell, JJ., dissent.
